price: Küfredenlerin yeryüzünde (Allah'ı) aciz bırakacaklarını sanma. Onların barınakları ateştir. Ne kötü dönüş!
arabic: لَا تَحۡسَبَنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مُعۡجِزِينَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَمَأۡوَىٰهُمُ ٱلنَّارُۖ وَلَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡمَصِيرُ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: lā taḥsabanna alladhīna kafarū muʿ'jizīna fī al-arḍi wamawāhumu al-nāru walabi'sa al-maṣīru
